name: Pathient Corporation
overview:
Pathient’s Connection Engine is a series of new Synaptic Search and Analytics Technologies that computationally connect the massive data sets of the Real-time Web and Enterprise data to support better understanding in real-time and achieve optimized results.

The scale of magnitude faster speed and analytic processing capabilities achieved enable multi-dimensional InterSocial Search and Adaptive Analytics that tames complexity, connects enterprise, social and government systems by virtually integrating trapped and hidden data, intelligently and in real-time correlating patterns and opportunities hidden within those streams to unlock the wealth of that data and provide the tools to respond in real time.
